name: UniversityofRhodeIsland
0:
”Alexa, ask University of Rhode Island for the latest news”
”Text that to me”
”Upcoming events”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: university of rhode island
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay up to date on the latest news from University of Rhode Island. With this skill you can...

* Hear the latest University of Rhode Island Facebook posts
* Hear a description of upcoming events
* Have any post texted to your phone. If you hear a post you are interested in, just say "text that to me" and a link to the post will be texted to your phone. If this is the first time you've used this feature, the skill will ask you to speak your cell phone number so it knows where to send the text.

A great way to keep informed using just your voice.
